sections.title: Next Actions

items: The Project Manager agent is not a mere coordinator but an institutional architect of cadence and governance. By aligning execution schedules with compliance obligations and external optics, this role enables Wrkstrm to maintain velocity without compromising structural resilience. Its enduring contribution is the establishment of an operational rhythm where technical milestones, fiscal governance, and regulatory optics converge into a unified stream of institutional integrity.
